name: Sala Khunnawut
description: '''Sala Khunnawut''' ({{Langx|th|สลา คุณวุฒิ}}, also spelled '''Kunnawut'''; born 5 April 1962) is a 2021 National Artist  Performing Arts (International Thai Music - Composing Thai Luk Thung Songs), Thai [[Luk thung]] songwriter and singer from the Isan area. Currently, he is a songwriter and producer for the record label [[Grammy Gold]], a network label of [[GMM Grammy]].
